    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    App
    JavaFX App This class is the entry point for the Alien Pet game application.
    GameLoop
    Represents the main game loop that manages updates to the game logic.
    GameManager
    Manages the game state, including loading, saving, and creating new games.
    GamePlay
    Handles the gameplay logic, including interactions with the pet and inventory management.
    GameplayScene
     
    InventoryController
    The InventoryController class manages the inventory UI and handles interactions with items, including displaying items, selecting items, and updating inventory information.
    Item
    Represents an item with various attributes such as type, price, and modifiers for happiness, hunger, and sleep.
    MainMenuController
    Controls the main menu of the application, handling user interactions with the menu buttons and loading save files or starting new games.
    Menu
    Represents a menu for navigating various actions in the application, such as starting the game, changing settings, or exiting the program.
    NewGameController
    Controls the New Game screen, allowing users to select a pet, name it, and create a new save file.
    ParentalControlsUI
    Represents the parental controls interface in the game.
    Pet
    The Pet class represents a virtual pet with various attributes and behaviours.
    SaveFile
    The SaveFile class represents the structure of a game save file.
    Settings
    The Settings class represents the settings configuration for the game.
    SettingsUI
    Represents the user interface for the settings menu.
    Shop
    The Shop class manages the in-game shop functionality, including loading items from a JSON file, organizing items into categories, and handling purchasing and selling operations.
    ShopController
    The ShopController class manages the user interface and interactions for the in-game shop.
    TutorialUI
    Represents the user interface for the tutorial screen.
